casebody.data:
CHAVIS
v.
TLC HOME HEALTH CARE. No. 531A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 18, 2005. Gregory M. Martin, J. Michael Riley, Raleigh, for Leigh Ann Chavis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of November 2005 by Defendants for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (TLC Home Health Care, et al.) shall have up to and including the 21st day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of November 2005."
